nbt.configuration.nameKey.tooltip: The name for the key used to store the bubble owners' name in the entity's persistent data
nbt.configuration.YOffset.tooltip: The offset above the entity's head at which the bubble renders
nbt.configuration.maxTextWidth.tooltip: The maximum width of the bubble text before it wraps to a new line
nbt.configuration.nameOffset.tooltip: Offset the bubble text if the entity's name is rendered above their head
nbt.configuration.playerBubbles.tooltip: Render chat messages above players heads in a bubble
nbt.configuration.showUsername.tooltip: Show the username of the player who sent the message in the bubble
nbt.configuration.title: Notable Bubble Text config
